faq.question: How long does video production take?
faq.answer: Timeline varies by project complexity. Simple social media videos can be completed in 1-2 weeks, while comprehensive commercial productions may take 4-6 weeks from concept to delivery. We provide detailed timelines during our initial consultation and keep you updated throughout the process.

faq.question: What types of videos can you produce?
faq.answer: We create all types of video content including promotional videos, social media content, corporate videos, testimonial videos, product demonstrations, event coverage, training videos, animated explainer videos, and full commercial productions. Tell us your goals and we'll recommend the best approach.

faq.question: Do you provide scriptwriting services?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Our creative team includes experienced scriptwriters who can develop compelling scripts that tell your story effectively. We can work from your ideas or develop concepts from scratch based on your business goals.

faq.question: What equipment do you use?
faq.answer: We use professional cinema cameras (RED, Sony FX series), professional lighting and audio equipment, gimbals and stabilizers, drones for aerial footage, and industry-standard editing software like Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, and DaVinci Resolve.

faq.question: Can you film on location in Galway City?
faq.answer: Yes! We regularly film on location throughout Galway City and County Galway. We handle all location logistics including permits if needed, and can film at your business premises, outdoor locations, or in our studio space.

faq.question: How much does video production cost?
faq.answer: Costs vary significantly based on your needs. Simple social media videos start from €1,500, while comprehensive commercial productions range from €5,000-€15,000+. Factors include video length, locations, talent, complexity, and post-production. We provide transparent quotes with no hidden fees.

faq.question: Will I own the rights to the video?
faq.answer: Yes! You receive full copyright ownership of the final videos and all rights for unlimited use across any platforms. We deliver videos in all formats you need for web, social media, and broadcasting.

faq.question: Can you help with video marketing and distribution?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We provide strategic guidance on video distribution, SEO optimization for YouTube, social media advertising, and video marketing campaigns to ensure your content reaches your target audience and delivers measurable results.
